pullRequest.title: Add Elastic 7 tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added elasticsearch tests against a 7.0.0 docker image.
this will allow to test fields added in this version like  date_nanos or flattened..

nodes.bodyText: Does the client.index() API call fail for ES 7?
Make this public, as it's part of the public interface of this class

nodes.bodyText: Why are we assigning a docId to documents? this was previously unnecessary?
Don't import the ObjectMapper from the shaded version of jackson inside testcontainers. Add a dependency for jackson to the module, instead.
Ah, that's because TestElasticsearchIntegrationSmokeTest is importing org.testcontainers.shaded.com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper. See my comment below.
